name: Thyme
headline: The OS for financial advisors
description:
There are 300k+ financial advisors in the US using a digital Rolodex to manage their client relationships, and it's time for a makeover.

At Thyme we are building the OS for financial advisors that allows them to automatically take notes in meetings (in-person, online, and phone calls), manage their client records with the help of AI, and offer a client portal where clients can track their assets, manage tasks, and even pay for their services. 

Our users have replaced their legacy CRMs and billing solutions with us while deepening their clients' relationships thanks to our client portal and AI tooling that puts rich context at their fingertips.

founders.name: Daniel Lantz, Founder
founders.description:
I am originally from Texas and currently reside in Richmond, VA. Prior to co-founding Thyme, I worked as a software engineer at Capital One, trovata.io, and meetcampfire.com (YC S23).

In my free time, I enjoy Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, chess, and spending time with my wife and son.

founders.name: Fernando San Martin, Founder
founders.description:
Electrical engineer from Spain. I moved to SF to start my career.
For the most part, I've worked at the intersection of finance, software, and data at places like Capital One, Zippi (YC s19), and Trovata.

  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k3xcu1fKzd3A7OcXH2wSVhhw.png)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/s12fnxTQv6Mk4CH9677q5GQIXw.png)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/maIY31NbdR9keRqAQNzjssoI.png)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/sWIfSVYeiYyAmj9YGBr6tocLWeo.png)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/tjCg5heiHALy4h48Dz068nv11k.png)


Benefits
Unleash your firm's potential
Unleash your firm's potential
Don't let your back office hold you back. 
Don't let your back office hold you back. 
Meeting Notes
Meeting Notes
Thyme joins your online, in-person, and phone meetings, and generates transcripts, summaries, and follow-up emails.
Thyme joins your online, in-person, and phone meetings, and generates transcripts, summaries, and follow-up emails.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VEZah7tBBJMsZpR8ZIaeVuUpjlE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VEZah7tBBJMsZpR8ZIaeVuUpjlE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VEZah7tBBJMsZpR8ZIaeVuUpjlE.png)
Client Portal
Client Portal
Your clients can log in to manage their tasks, exchange files securely, and track their portfolio.
Your clients can log in to manage their tasks, exchange files securely, and track their portfolio.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FJJKNdCk7Yniq5tl9NVTHdphbw.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FJJKNdCk7Yniq5tl9NVTHdphbw.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/I5elo5krwAdFZcXL6HZUnj5Lh4.png?scale-down-to=2048)
Onboarding
Onboarding
Create rich questionnaires, including e-signatures and file uploads, and assign them to prospects and clients.
Create rich questionnaires, including e-signatures and file uploads, and assign them to prospects and clients.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/16itrCFQJxFxsPoGDjV6umDlU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/16itrCFQJxFxsPoGDjV6umDlU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/16itrCFQJxFxsPoGDjV6umDlU.png)
Billing
Billing
Bill your clients directly from within Thyme starting at just 0.8% for ACH.
Bill your clients directly from within Thyme starting at just 0.8% for ACH.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vuRWrpSB9xrkFEvS7nROB7U5UU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vuRWrpSB9xrkFEvS7nROB7U5UU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vuRWrpSB9xrkFEvS7nROB7U5UU.png)
Document Intelligence
Document Intelligence
Turn 1040s, W2s, estate documents, and custodian statements into data and insight.
Turn 1040s, W2s, estate documents, and custodian statements into data and insight.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oaTms6wiQHE2zMAqqhDtphbPP38.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oaTms6wiQHE2zMAqqhDtphbPP38.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oaTms6wiQHE2zMAqqhDtphbPP38.png)
CRM Integrations
CRM Integrations
We support your stack, from CRM, to online meeting tools.
We support your stack, from CRM, to online meeting tools.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/t5H0kMpcLltB61lLr0PtMloSF5U.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/t5H0kMpcLltB61lLr0PtMloSF5U.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/t5H0kMpcLltB61lLr0PtMloSF5U.png)
Features
Holistic AI Engine
Holistic AI Engine
With context from meetings, emails, documents, and more, our AI uses the big picture to uplevel your advice.
With context from meetings, emails, documents, and more, our AI uses the big picture to uplevel your advice.
With context from meetings, emails, documents, and more, our AI uses the big picture to uplevel your advice.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FLOAWaUx7BHBdnyjmQmnF9C4.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FLOAWaUx7BHBdnyjmQmnF9C4.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FLOAWaUx7BHBdnyjmQmnF9C4.png?scale-down-to=2048)
Security
Privacy & Security
Privacy & Security
We follow best practices for privacy and security that align with regulatory requirements.
We follow best practices for privacy and security that align with regulatory requirements.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2xiH1XWx24uqG9yp9JkrJWagBM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2xiH1XWx24uqG9yp9JkrJWagBM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2xiH1XWx24uqG9yp9JkrJWagBM.png)
Security first
Security is Thyme's priority. Our founders have a decade of experience as SWE in the finance industry, and we only use leading cloud providers. We've passed security reviews by Microsoft, Google, and Zoom. 
Security is Thyme's priority. Our founders have a decade of experience as SWE in the finance industry, and we only use leading cloud providers. We've passed security reviews by Microsoft, Google, and Zoom. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PwCqA6O84eTTABvrN8qa6AyKiE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PwCqA6O84eTTABvrN8qa6AyKiE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PwCqA6O84eTTABvrN8qa6AyKiE.png)
TLS 1.2
We use strong encryption, in transit and at rest, using TLS 1.2, and strong hashing algorithms. Our authentication is handled by Auth0, and 2FA via rotating codes is available.
We use strong encryption, in transit and at rest, using TLS 1.2, and strong hashing algorithms. Our authentication is handled by Auth0, and 2FA via rotating codes is available.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jcJx7XNnORheY8HMirrQw1L8.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jcJx7XNnORheY8HMirrQw1L8.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jcJx7XNnORheY8HMirrQw1L8.png)
Artificial Intelligence
Thyme uses AI models to power parts of the application. As per the contract with our cloud providers, we own the input and output of these models, and no information is ever shared or used in training. AI is as safe as any other cloud service such as a database.
Thyme uses AI models to power parts of the application. As per the contract with our cloud providers, we own the input and output of these models, and no information is ever shared or used in training. AI is as safe as any other cloud service such as a database.
Testimonials
What customers are saying
What customers are saying
Trusted by dozens of firms - hear their take on Thyme.
Trusted by dozens of firms - hear their take on Thyme.
  * Saving me hours each month.Setting up Thyme took just a few minutes. Their summarization feature works great, and I love being able to ask plain questions about previous conversations.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pazbNhFrr139TLJDmabFHGt2aBs.png)
Scott Boyles
CFP®
  * Game changer.Instead of handwriting follow-up emails and manually entering tasks, I use Thyme to do all this with a couple of clicks.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9Yeng77z7nwLnp0DNfkPFM3UyOA.png)
Mark Wyand
Founder of Layline Advisors
  * As a Fee-only advisor, efficiency is the name of the game. I've been particularly impressed with Thyme's onboarding. Their drag and drop interface is a delight, and I no longer rely on JotForm.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ixLkvtUFneFc1KhfiqumuevIa2M.png)
Travis Tracy
Founder at FortitudeFP
  * I've been able to simplify my stack with Thyme. What used to be five different subscriptions is now just Thyme: meeting notes, billing, file handling, forms, and a client portal with portfolio tracking and client tasks 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/1pf836oscx1hEJqsQelbNtLK6w.jpeg)
John Munley 
Founder at wHealth Advisors
  * Thyme has built a powerful suite of solutions designed to simplify and automate the advisors' day-to-day activity. They offer a productivity boost that is major welcome news for any advisor providing them more time to build and manage client relationships.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UitlqMiZRavlPPhdJCQ3E2ewZvY.jpeg)
Matt Moynihan
Financial Services Digital Executive
  * I am fascinated by the household summary. I manage a few households and the ability to quickly come up to speed on someone that I haven't talked to in a while is priceless.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KTfLuFaBAYpNt7EN2j3erlgFCs.svg)

Security
Privacy & Security
Privacy & Security
We follow best practices for privacy and security that align with regulatory requirements.
We follow best practices for privacy and security that align with regulatory requirements.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2xiH1XWx24uqG9yp9JkrJWagBM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2xiH1XWx24uqG9yp9JkrJWagBM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2xiH1XWx24uqG9yp9JkrJWagBM.png)
Security first
Security is Thyme's priority. Our founders have a decade of experience as SWE in the finance industry, and we only use leading cloud providers. We've passed security reviews by Microsoft, Google, and Zoom. 
Security is Thyme's priority. Our founders have a decade of experience as SWE in the finance industry, and we only use leading cloud providers. We've passed security reviews by Microsoft, Google, and Zoom. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PwCqA6O84eTTABvrN8qa6AyKiE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PwCqA6O84eTTABvrN8qa6AyKiE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PwCqA6O84eTTABvrN8qa6AyKiE.png)
TLS 1.2
We use strong encryption, in transit and at rest, using TLS 1.2, and strong hashing algorithms. Our authentication is handled by Auth0, and 2FA via rotating codes is available.
We use strong encryption, in transit and at rest, using TLS 1.2, and strong hashing algorithms. Our authentication is handled by Auth0, and 2FA via rotating codes is available.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jcJx7XNnORheY8HMirrQw1L8.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jcJx7XNnORheY8HMirrQw1L8.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jcJx7XNnORheY8HMirrQw1L8.png)
Artificial Intelligence
Thyme uses AI models to power parts of the application. As per the contract with our cloud providers, we own the input and output of these models, and no information is ever shared or used in training. AI is as safe as any other cloud service such as a database.
Thyme uses AI models to power parts of the application. As per the contract with our cloud providers, we own the input and output of these models, and no information is ever shared or used in training. AI is as safe as any other cloud service such as a database.

CFP®

Founder of Layline Advisors

generated_description:
**Thyme: Revolutionizing FinTech with AI for Financial Advisors**

Founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator’s Batch S24, Thyme is establishing itself as the go-to operating system for financial advisors—a sector that boasts over 300,000 professionals in the U.S. still clinging to outdated digital Rolodexes. The company, based in San Francisco, is laser-focused on transforming how financial advisors manage client relationships, leveraging artificial intelligence to replace cumbersome legacy systems.

**Mission and Offerings**

Thyme aims to be more than just another CRM. Its innovative platform automates note-taking during meetings—whether in-person, online, or on the phone—thanks to an advanced AI tool. Moreover, Thyme enables advisors to maintain comprehensive client records effortlessly, while offering a client portal for tracking assets, managing tasks, and facilitating payments.

With features that include automated meeting notes, billing capabilities, document intelligence, onboarding tools, and robust CRM integrations, Thyme is positioning itself as an all-in-one solution for financial advisory firms. Advisors report significant efficiency gains, allowing them to concentrate more on nurturing client relationships rather than drowning in administrative tasks.

**User Experience and Security**

Testimonials from users underscore Thyme’s effectiveness; many describe it as a "game changer" that simplifies their tech stack and saves valuable time. The platform’s user-friendly interface makes onboarding a breeze, and its AI-enhanced features offer critical insights at the touch of a button.

Security is paramount for Thyme. The company touts rigorous practices aligning with regulatory standards and utilizes seasoned engineers with over a decade of experience in finance. Further, it employs strong encryption protocols and authentication measures—ensuring that user data remains protected.

**The Future of Thyme**

With a lean team of two and the strategic guidance of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, Thyme is poised for growth within the evolving FinTech landscape. The founders' commitment to building a secure and efficient product means they are not just another startup—Thyme has the potential to redefine how financial advisors operate and engage with their clients.

For more information, you can visit [Thyme's website](https://www.meetthyme.com/). If you’re among the many financial professionals still entangled in outdated systems, perhaps it’s time to consider what Thyme has to offer.
